      • containsSection

        public boolean containsSection(java.lang.Object section)
        Returns true if this configuration contains a mapping for the specified section. More formally, returns true if and only if this configuration contains a mapping for a section s such that ( section==null ? s==null : section.equals(s)). (There can be at most one such mapping.)
        Parameters:
        section - section whose presence in this configuration is to be tested
        Returns:
        true if this configuration contains a mapping for the specified section
